transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Yes sir. Sir abhi hamari baat hui thi regarding services.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Yes sir. To uske regarding aapka mujhe closer ID dalna padega. To aapke behalf pe ticket raise ho gaya tha.
Customer: Matlab kya hai? Main thoda sa abhi busy hu.
Executive: Nahi sir mujhe bas aapke kam time nahi hai. Sir abhi humne discussion kiya tha na.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Uske aapne customer care pe phone kar diya tha. Is vajah se ticket raise ho gaya tha.
Executive: Wo band karna hota hai. To aapke paas ek mail aata hai. Jisme aapko satisfaction mark karna hoga.
Executive: To fir main is ticket ko close kar du na?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Agar aapko koi aur issue hota hai to aap mere number pe phone kar lijiyega. Ye aap number save kar lijiyega.
Customer: Yehi number hai na aapka?
Executive: Haan Vanshika ke naam se save kar dijiye.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Isi number pe aap call kar lijiyega.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Closer ID to be added regarding services.

- Ticket raised on customer's behalf.



Resolution:

- Ticket to be closed after customer marks satisfaction on the received mail.

- Executive provided her number for further assistance.



Next Steps: 

Issue resolved



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral to positive



@@@Key Topics:

services, ticket, closer id, satisfaction
